00009 #ifndef StreamMain_Subsequence_h
00010 #define StreamMain_Subsequence_h

00012 #include <string>
00013 #include <vector>
00014 #include "math.h"
00015 #include "type_defs.h"
00016 
00017 static const data_t kMIN_VALID_DIST = -.0001; // not 0 cuz of floating pt error
00018 static const tick_t kINVALID_LATENCY = -99999;
00019 //static const char* kDEFAULT_LABEL = "DEFAULT_LBL";
00020 static const char* kDEFAULT_LABEL = "";
00021 
00023 class Subsequence {
00024 public:
00025         tick_t ts;              
00026         tick_t te;              
00027         tick_t latency; 
00028         data_t dist;    
00029         std::string label; 
00030         
00031         Subsequence();
00032         Subsequence(tick_t ts, tick_t te, data_t dist, std::string label);
00033         
00037         bool matches(const Subsequence& referenceSeq, double startThresh=.5, 
00038                                  double endThresh=.5);
00039         
00042         inline bool isValidAnswer() const {
00043                 return (! label.empty() ) && te > ts && te > 0 && dist < INFINITY;
00044         }
00045 
00048         inline bool isValid() const {
00049                 return (! label.empty() ) && te > ts && te > 0 &&
00050                         dist >= kMIN_VALID_DIST && dist < INFINITY;
00051         }
00052         
00053         bool operator==(const Subsequence &other) const;
00054         bool operator!=(const Subsequence &other) const;
00055         Subsequence& operator=(const Subsequence &other);
00056 };
00057 
00058 // File I/O
00059 Subsequence subsequenceFromString(std::string line);
00060 std::vector<Subsequence> readSubsequences(std::string fileName);
00061 void writeSubsequences(std::string filename, std::vector<Subsequence> subs);
00062 
00063 //operator overloads
00064 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &strm, const Subsequence &s);
